data.title: 025: THE KING OF FIGHTERS '94 + '95 The Definitive Soundtrack — Brave Wave Productions
data.text:
THE KING OF FIGHTERS ‘94 & 'THE KING OF FIGHTERS ‘95 The Definitive Soundtrack come to CD & Vinyl!

SNK, Brave Wave Productions and Limited Run Games are proud to announce that both THE KING OF FIGHTERS ‘94 and THE KING OF FIGHTERS ‘95 soundtracks are coming to CD and Vinyl in summer 2021.

Both soundtracks will be released individually at the same time, both numbered as Generation Series 025. KOF94 will be released as GS-025 Vol. 1, while KOF95 will be released as GS-025 Vol. 2.

As the debut title of SNK’s most iconic fighting game franchise, KOF ‘94, composed by M.Hataya as part of the SNK NEO Sound Orchestra, laid the groundwork for the KOF series’ beloved music. For the sequel KOF95, M.Hataya reprised his role while being joined by composers Akihiro Uchida and Pearl Sibakiti.

As Generation Series releases, the KOF94 and KOF95 soundtracks will both feature newly remastered analog and digital tracks, as well as a booklet containing archival artwork and liner notes by former development team members, including level designer Toyohisa Tanabe.

The vinyl editions for both soundtracks will each come in a single 150g colored record in a sleeve. Both releases will be available for purchase individually. If purchasing through Limited Run Games or BigWax, there will also be a bundle containing both releases offered at a discount. There will also be a signed edition by Toyohisa Tanabe limited to 300 copies worldwide. Both standalone releases will retail for US$27.99, as a bundle containing both releases for $49.99, and the signed edition bundle for US$64.99.

The 1-CD editions of both albums will retail for US$14.99.
